content:
From: Makarius <makarius@sketis.net>
This is a reminder that we are heading towards Isabelle2025-1-RC1, which is
scheduled for next week. The plan says 03-Nov-2025, but it might turn out 1-2
days later (not more).

It is now high time to wrap-up and actually finish things --- instead of
adding new things. Afterwards we will have a few weeks to polish everything,
but the final release needs to be shipped before the Christmas vacation
(approx. 20-Dec-2025 until 12-Jan-2026). That is a hard deadline that cannot
be postponed.

This is particularly relevant for AFP.

Makarius

From: Makarius <makarius@sketis.net>
On 27/10/2025 10:57, Makarius wrote:

This is a reminder that we are heading towards Isabelle2025-1-RC1, which is
scheduled for next week. The plan says 03-Nov-2025, but it might turn out 1-2
days later (not more).

The plan is to do it on Wed 12-Nov-2025 approx. 11:00 RBT (Royal Bavarian Time).

This gives a window of opportunity of update NEWS (and maybe CONTRIBUTORS):
I've seen various changes passing by without a proper entry in the "history of
user-relevant changes".

Makarius

From: Makarius <makarius@sketis.net>
On 03/11/2025 19:47, Makarius wrote:

On 27/10/2025 10:57, Makarius wrote:

This is a reminder that we are heading towards Isabelle2025-1-RC1, which is
scheduled for next week. The plan says 03-Nov-2025, but it might turn out
1-2 days later (not more).

The plan is to do it on Wed 12-Nov-2025 approx. 11:00 RBT (Royal Bavarian Time).

I've started the Admin/build_release at 12:00 and it required many hours,
until now. We have tons of great material, and many platforms ...

Presently, the isabelle-dev repository is still for the Isabelle2025-1
release. The disengagement and fork to
https://isabelle.sketis.net/repos/isabelle-release will happen for RC2 or RC3,
depending how fast AFP gets ready for release (hopefully in the same calendar
year).

Makarius
